properties.name: retail.ui.theme
properties.description: Name of the theme for the UI

properties.name: retail.ui.disable-demo-warnings
properties.description: Disable the UI messages warning about demonstration content

properties.name: retail.ui.product-images-path
properties.description: Overrides the location where the sample product images are sourced from to use the specified file path

properties.name: retail.ui.endpoints.catalog
properties.description: HTTP endpoint for the catalog service

properties.name: retail.ui.endpoints.carts
properties.description: HTTP endpoint for the carts service

properties.name: retail.ui.endpoints.checkout
properties.description: HTTP endpoint for the checkout service

properties.name: retail.ui.endpoints.orders
properties.description: HTTP endpoint for the orders service

properties.name: retail.ui.chat.max-tokens
properties.description: Chat assistant model maximum output tokens

properties.name: retail.ui.chat.model
properties.description: Chat assistant model provider model ID
